We are aware of the fact that RAMESH ARAVIND, DATTANNA, MANOHMURTHY, namma UVCEs proud alumni who with their skills have created a everlasting impact on Kannada film industry. UVCEs leading colligate Club which aims to improve one's skill in acting is Thathva. Currently the club consists of 60+ students involved in the activity.
Thathva was established by Abhishek chakma ECE batch of 2015. It was inspired by club Darpan which was once pretty established in college
Thathva put up plays in all fests in our college Team also made a short movie. It took part in a street play enseble called manthan which took place in Forum mall, Kormangla.
The objective is to Promote theatre in college Set up a platform For theatre enthusiasts to collaborate and do what they love
